name: msi-keyboard-gui
description: The First fully featured GUI MSI Keyboard controller for Linux
author: Steve Lacy <me@slacy.me> http://slacy.me

scripts.build:linux: npm run build:app && electron-packager ./dist/app/ --overwrite --out=dist --electron-version=1.4.13 --platform=linux --arch=x64 --app-bundle-id=com.stevelacy.msikeyboard --app-version=$npm_package_version && cd dist/msi-keyboard-gui-linux-x64/ && zip -ryq9 ../msi-keyboard-gui-linux-${npm_package_version}.zip *
scripts.build:app: npm_config_target=1.4.13 npm_config_disturl=https://atom.io/download/electron npm_config_runtime=electron npm_config_build_from_source=true npm rebuild && babel src/ --out-dir ./dist/app/src/ && cp -t ./dist/app/src/ ./src/index.html ./src/index.css && cp -rt ./dist/app/ index.js package.json node_modules
